channel.title: Help me fix this code

item.title: Help me fix this code
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

[quote="†™, post:4, topic:222347"]erm my codings abit rusty now that i aint coded in ages, but you tryed …

if(playerLevel[10] >= 90) if(itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) { deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1); deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1); addItem(15185, 1); sendMessage("You create an Antifire Sheild!"); else if(playerLevel[10] <= 90) sendMessage("Sorry, you don't have high enough smithing lvl!"); }

Do NOT take my word for this though, i aint tested it so aint 100% sure back up your current 1 though, this might work it might not, gl ^^[/quote]yeh theres somthing wrong with that code, i change the else to if and i get no errors but it doesnt send the message…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 06:57:00 pm[/size][hr]Ok and i just look in my info and says 13 is the smithing code, can some one back me up on this, once i find the true code i will post the working code. I did get it working.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 06:59:35 pm[/size][hr]Working code:

if(itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
if(playerLevel[10] >= 90) {
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
sendMessage(“You create an Anti-Dragonfire Sheild!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to have 90 smithing to make the shield.”);
}
}
if(itemUsed == 1540 && useWith == 15187) {
if(playerLevel[10] >= 90) {
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
sendMessage(“You create an Anti-Dragonfire Sheild!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to have 90 smithing to make the shield.”);
}
}

i just dont know if the 10 should be a 13.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 07:02:47 pm[/size][hr]Ok it is 13… thank you all this was the best help since sliced bread… the rep goes to mad dog, thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this code
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

just switch the IDs around, or make it so they both connect to the same code

if((itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) || (itemUsed == 1540 && useWith == 15187)) { if(playerLevel[10] >= 90) { deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1); deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1); addItem(15185, 1); sendMessage("You create an Anti-Dragonfire Sheild!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to have 90 smithing to make the shield."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help me fix this code
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

Ok i am helping this guy for a dfs code:

[code]

        if(itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
           deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
           deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
   if(playerLevel[10] >= 90)
           addItem(15185, 1);
           sendMessage("You create an Antifire Sheild!");
        }[/code]

But when needed 90 smithing it says you created the sheild but it doenst appear, how do i make it so it doesnt create it and says you need 90 smithing?

Read full topic
